item.description:
@coldfx69 wrote:

Sorry wronge section, i wasent paying attention.

In rs2loginprotocol or in Login if your using palidino-

if (p.skillLvl[3] <= 0) { p.skillLvl[3] = 1; for (Player ap : Engine.players) { if (ap == null) continue; if (!ap.online) continue; ap.getActionSender().sendMessage(ap, "<col=FF3300>" + p.username + " has just logged back in from an x-log."); }

You can also Make it just ban them, but thats up to you.
